Key Match Events: Christian Bethancourt drove in seven runs, including a go-ahead two-run single in the ninth, as the Chicago Cubs rallied past the Pittsburgh Pirates 14-10 on Wednesday to sweep a three-game series.
Christian Bethancourt homered to center (431 feet), Crow-Armstrong scored.
C. Bethancourt doubled to left, Crow-Armstrong scored and Swanson scored.
Happ singled to center, Bethancourt scored.
Tauchman singled to center, Bethancourt scored, Happ to third.
Suzuki singled to center, Happ scored, Tauchman to third.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Christian Bethancourt drove in 7 as Chicago Cubs rally past Pirates for 14-10 victory
The game was played at PNC Park in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
Others: The Cubs swept the three-game series with a 14-10 victory.
The final score was 14-10 in favor of the Cubs.
